stable.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
stable.bodyMarkdown:
### ‚ú® New Features
- [`8a78219`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/8a78219ae94dffebaa10b62ec7592e7a6bca9177) - material3 expressive design *(PR #73 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`40aac9f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/40aac9f10a1cd051f64f204f3eefda7d6a3f5c27) - **maps**: redesign list options, items per grid row option *(PR #74 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`d93989b`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/d93989b97fc79f019e18caf91dbd3f315ea61b15) - show translation percentages *(PR #76 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`6287484`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/6287484eba11a6a9e6e2faacaced414e2b905122) - **maps**: improve navigation and FAB, redesign map details *(PR #77 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`ee492b8`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ee492b811909a1bc422298ed93432222634962b0) - ability to cancel indeterminate progress dialogs *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`336ee2f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/336ee2fce95674a9a6b2a13df115ef7c1cc28f0a) - **maps**: option to export to custom location *(PR #78 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`560d83f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/560d83fe9b70c807ee4c82adf3dc9a97b1857124) - some more ui improvements *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`b11b03f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/b11b03fdb3a331949cc7a54703b685b6fcd766b2) - more expressive design *(PR #79 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`f2ee8b0`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f2ee8b06cfb37898cef7eafae5b873c539ef36fb) - **maps-list**: button to select/deselect all *(PR #82 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`57ade44`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/57ade44aaa7e5dba5d6e6dbb24965dc0fd7fcc71) - use contained loading indicator, use segmentor in map thumbnail viewer *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`8ebb15d`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/8ebb15d0ac7ebfef19547755fb42a920ad06cc6e) - **l10n**: update translations *(PR #80 by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`2c55327`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/2c553276f8843e831718b51e831d0834b3ef5fa9) - use correct naming for Sui Zygisk module *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`0f009c3`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0f009c3ef2baee9a90f3a5f58cf78ccfae0f5d56) - remove line breaks from map names *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`9da7c74`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/9da7c743208f97852b4b30306a3618cdb15286bc) - **maps**: crash when launching with invalid URL *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`20ed6a4`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/20ed6a4af6ea0a8bd8d65fee3989e59043ad8b26) - **maps**: make sure files are initialized *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### ‚ö° Performance Improvements
- [`d360992`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/d3609929b962a3312b6e895cabab2728a7af01a1) - improve maps loading performance *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### ‚ôªÔ∏è Refactors
- [`bc6a63f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/bc6a63f20c599b1c57ef052c670d432c8e81def3) - migrate to navigation3 *(PR #75 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`2940430`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/294043021062cca3fee7f2425fc5649a837661f3) - **MapAction**: safe arguments *(PR #81 by @aliernfrog)*

preRelease.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
